msbt.message: I'm quite fond of this island. So fond, in fact, I can't help but wonder what life here would be like
If I were to live on this island, every day would be like a vacation! I think I could get used to that.
I feel like time moves slower here. The pace of thingsit just feels so relaxing. Ah , it would be lovely to own a home here, don't you think?
I'm quite fond of this island. So fond, in fact, I can't help but wonder what life here would be like
If I were to live on this island, every day would be like a vacation! I think I could get used to that.
I feel like time moves slower here. The pace of thingsit just feels so relaxing. Ah , it would be lovely to own a home here, don't you think?

Since we've both traveled from far away to get here, we should go check out the island's shop. Shopping is one of my favorite parts of traveling, you know.Oh, and I understand that are the local delicacy! We really must try them! Goodness, wouldn't it be nice to live here?

It's important to get away from it all now and then. And I mean REALLY get away from it all, . Leaving behind modern conveniences can bedifficult. Still, it's so very good for one's overall constitution. Camping here, for exampleit's the epitome of a true getaway. Truth be told, I could see myself moving here.

It's important to get away from it all now and then. And I mean REALLY get away from it all, . Leaving behind modern conveniences can bedifficult. Still, it's so very good for one's overall constitution. Camping here, for exampleit's the epitome of a true getaway. In fact, I best enjoy relaxing here while I can! I'll be moving to the island for good, after all. And you know what that meanslots and lots of preparations.
Relaxing in the comforts of one's home is lovely, but camping out in nature has its charms too. Fresh air, gorgeous scenery, good friendsthis is what memories are made of, .

Don't get me wrong, darling, camping is a ton of fun. There's just one problem with itIt's nearly impossible to maintain the level of hygiene to which I am accustomed! I mean, nature is beautiful and all but it is also very, VERY grimy.I tell you, as soon as I get home, I'm going to jump into a nice hot bath. And I may never get out.

Ah, do you live here? I'm . A pleasure.I needed a little escape, darling, so here I am on this island, getting in touch with nature and such. I wasn't sure what I thought at first, but I tell youI've really grown to like this place, .

Well, you're not a shy one, are you? My name's . How kind of you to stop by. I absolutely love this island, don't you? The air! The trees! The water! It's all so splendid. I confess, I can't help but think how fabulous it would be to live here, .

Oh, thank you for stopping by. I don't believe we've met. I'm . This is SUCH a fabulous place, darling! Oh, I hate to admit it, but I am terribly envious of you. Getting to live in a place like this don't you dare take it for granted, !
Oh my, did I keep you waiting? I couldn't WAIT to come here after getting your invite, .
I'm so happy to see you! Thank you for inviting me to enjoy your fabulous island, !
This island is simply stunning! II don't know what to say except THANK YOU for inviting me! Please excuse my excitement. It's all just so delightfully overwhelming, .
Why, how do you do, ?Someone from this island invited me here for a little camping trip. How could I possibly say no?
I was invited here by a local, you know. It's quite the honor, don't you think? Now that I'm here, darling, I am ready to experience the magic, !
One of the lovely local residents invited me to try camping here. So I came as soon as I could. I just HAD to see what all the fuss was about!

It's important that one set out on new travel adventures whenever one can, . It's the best way to see new things and meet new folksnot to mention find new places to shop! It's refreshing for one's soul, darling. The traveling AND the shopping.

To be honest, darling, I wouldn't have thought camping like this would suit me. After all, I usually loathe to go without basic amenitiesyou know, like an infinity pool or a heated bidet. But much to my surprise, roughing it suits me just fine. I find it appeals to my bold nature. No, this isn't about to let a little fresh air and an unkempt wilderness keep her from adventure!
When I went camping as a young with my family, I loooved toasting marshmallows over the fire. I wasn't very patient, so I usually burned them. But I didn't mind. They still tasted delicious to me.

It's important that one set out on new travel adventures whenever one can, . It's the best way to see new things and meet new folksnot to mention find new places to shop! It's refreshing for one's soul, darling. The traveling AND the shopping.

To be honest, darling, I wouldn't have thought camping like this would suit me. After all, I usually loathe to go without basic amenitiesyou know, like an infinity pool or a heated bidet. But much to my surprise, roughing it suits me just fine. I find it appeals to my bold nature. No, this isn't about to let a little fresh air and an unkempt wilderness keep her from adventure!
When I went camping as a young with my family, I loooved toasting marshmallows over the fire. I wasn't very patient, so I usually burned them. But I didn't mind. They still tasted delicious to me.

You can't go camping without a campfire. It's just not done, darling.Gathering around the firetelling spooky stories in the flickering lightit's a time-honored tradition! Though I confess it's much harder to go to sleep in a dark tent after that, !

You know, darling, I used to think traveling to unknown places just wasn't for me. But getting away from my own island and flying to someplace completely differentit's downright exhilarating! Plus, the whole "island adventurer" thingit looks rather good on me, don't you think, ?

My goodness, I can't stop thinking about what life will be like once I've moved in here. Yoga on the beach sounds lovely so does reading a book in the shade of a tree. I'm going to be too excited to sleep tonight, !

Seeing how I'll be moving, I suppose I should get started on a deep clean of my current home. While I do tend to keep it spotless, I'm sure there are a few dust bunnies that need to be dealt with. I tell you, , dust bunnies are my LEAST favorite type of bunny!

Oooh, I'm so excited about my big move! Hmm...perhaps I should start looking into new furniture? Yes! Yes I should! I can see it now my fab new island padflush with all the latest interior styles Oh dear! This kind of excitement can only lead to one thing Me spending too many Bells!

Ah, I need to inform you of a new development. invited me to move to this island. I thought it best to let you know, seeing that we'll be neighbors and all. Anyhoo, I can't WAIT to swap interior-design ideas and fashion tips with you, .

So, darling, some news It seems yours truly will be moving to this island! It was 's idea that I make the big move. And I thoughtwhy not?! The only problem is, I have so much to do in the meantime! Packing cleaningtelling everyone I know Well, , once I'm done with all of THAT, let's get together for a nice chat, shall we?

Now, I want you to brace yourself for a bit of news. So here's the thing I'm moving to this island! It's not that I don't like my current island, darling Not at all.It's just that was so insistent I make the move. Andit's just nice to be wanted. So I shall enjoy the rest of my camping trip and then get started moving my belongings. Well, I can't wait to get to know you betterfuture neighbor.

Guess what, darling. Yours truly is officially moving to this island in the near future! That means YOU will be living on the same island as little ol' ME!The question iscan you handle that much ME? Why, of course you can! Anyhoo, I hope we become fast friends, . The fastest!

I have some BIG news to share, ! Soyours truly will be moving to THIS island! It's true! Oh, it won't be this very second, mind youbut it will be soon.I know it's difficult to contain your excitement, but you really must try.You'll need to be at your sharpest since I'll be relying on YOU to teach me the way.

So! I have news! You see, while staying at the campsite has been lovely I've decided it's time to take my commitment to to the next level. That's right! I'll be moving here FOR REAL, ! I mean, why not? I LOVE this place! Of course, if I'm being honest, I think needs me as much as I need it.

I only meant to come here for a little getaway, but now that it's nearly time to leaveit makes me quite sad. I can't help but imagine what my life would be like if I lived on instead. No doubt it would be a step up from what I'm used to, .
Then live here!
It's nothing special.

My mind knows I must go home tomorrow, but my heart is in denial.What can I say? This vacationand this islandhave been TOO fabulous, .It makes me wonder how much MORE fabulous is when you live here for good.
Move and find out!
You may never know.

I'm not usually so easily won over, darling, but I confess I've grown fond of . Yes, I shall miss this place when I leave tomorrow.How marvelous must it be to live herefor good. I can't stop thinking about it, .
Then come live here!
It IS pretty great.
Well, it may seem like nothing special to you, but it is a lovely island, I assure you. It certainly gets MY stamp of approval.
Well, yes, I guess that's true. 's real charms may remain a mystery to me. One must live in a place, I suppose, to truly understand it.
Well, perhaps some day I might have the opportunity to live here and find out for myself. Until then, don't you go forgetting about me, .

You know, I shall forever treasure the DIY souvenirs made for me on this island. Of course, if I lived here, I could unleash my OWN design talents upon ! I am quite good, you know. I can see it now Everyone would be clamoring for my work, .
You should live here!
It's good to dream.

The souvenirs I've received while visiting are simply exquisite! I am something of a collector, you know. So I know a thing or two about these things, . I can see it nowif I lived here, I would just go on and on expanding my collection
Then move here!
That's nice.

I've had more fun than I thought possible collecting authentic -crafted items. And each souvenir has such a wonderful memory associated with it too. Alas, all these fabulous memories are making it awfully hard for me to leave .
You should live here!
Awww, cheer up!

Yes, wellI suppose it's best I take my souvenirs and get back to my island, then. I am sure to have a long line of folks waiting to consult with me on various design projects. It's not easy being in such high demand, .
Eh, yes, it IS nice, my dear.Well, I suppose the lovely pieces I acquired on this trip will have to suffice for now. But I do hope to return some day and continue adding to my collection!
Oh, thank you. But don't you worry about me, my dear.I'm sure I'll be right as rain as soon as I'm back on my own island.
